item.title: Apple 'Open' to Acquisition That Accelerates AI Roadmap
item.description: Apple is “open” to an acquisition that would accelerate its AI roadmap, Apple CEO Tim Cook told CNBC today. Cook said that Apple sees AI as one of the “most profound technologies of our lifetime,” and

item.title: SiriusXM Reports Drop to 33 Million Paid Subscribers, Strength in Podcasting
item.description: While paid subscribers fell from the previous quarter, the audio giant noted an improvement in churn.

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg Details Meta’s Plan for Self-Improving, Superintelligent AI
item.description: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg told investors that his new research lab will focus on building AI models that can learn with minimal human input.
